spatial_accuracy.notes: Major structural deviations identified. The 3D model adds an extra exterior wall protrusion in the living room not present in the 2D plan. The central bathroom is incorrectly placed as a corner room in the render, losing the central circulation logic of the original plan. Windows are incorrectly placed on several walls.

structural_fidelity.notes: Hallucinated an bump-out room in the living area. The stairs are severely truncated/incomplete compared to the long run shown in the floor plan. However, the 'floating model' and 'dark background' constraints were perfectly met with no text labels.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture block-style is excellent and consistent. Points deducted for the sofa placement in a hallucinated alcove and the toilet being placed in an open-access area rather than the private enclosure shown in the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The aesthetic perfectly matches the style prompt. Low-poly geometry, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and soft ambient light are flawlessly executed.

detected_errors.description: Central bathroom moved to a peripheral corner location, breaking the layout adjacency.
Hallucinated a structural bump-out/alcove in the living room area not present in the rectangular floor plan.
Missing several windows shown in the floor plan, specifically those near the entrance and dining room corners.
Staircase is shortened to 3-4 steps, failing to represent the full flight shown in the 2D plan.
